name: hello-ai
description: A simple AI assistant plugin that uses Jean API to provide quick responses and chat functionality
author: JeanTrail Team

permissions.name: ui.panel
permissions.description: Create UI panels for the chat interface

permissions.name: storage.read
permissions.description: Read plugin settings and chat history

permissions.name: storage.write
permissions.description: Save plugin settings and chat history

settings.systemPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant integrated into JeanTrail. Provide concise and helpful responses.
